channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Orange graffiti on lamp post, 15th July
item.description:
In addition to the already reported graffiti on a bus stop, there is also graffiti on the lamp post a few metres along from there.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 78, Bridgen Road, Bexley, London

item.title: Dog Fouling every day, 3 times a day., 15th July
item.description:
Could you please help us with this problem.

item.title: Dangerous pothole. Been here over a week., 15th July
item.description:
The pothole is near Fennies bus stop at South Eden Park. A cyclist, biker could get seriously hurt if their wheel goes into this. While some markings have been sprayed on it, they cannot be seen from yards away. It's been here over a week. Can this be looked at urgently please?

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): South Eden Park Road, Eden Park, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Abandoned bin with dog mess and rubbish & flies, 15th July
item.description:
This Bexley council garden bin has been abandoned in Telegraph Hill - Upper Drakefell Road entrance and has been here for weeks, neither council (Lewisham or Bexley) will accept responsibility or empty the bin. The bin is full of dog mess and rubbish there are flies all around the bin and the problem is getting worse each day as the rubbish continues to build. I live next door to the park entrance and am worried about the environmental risk to residents.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Drakefell Road, New Cross Gate, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: RTC Debris, 15th July
item.description:
RTC debris remains on the road outside no.15 Valley road. The majority was cleared before the vehicle was removed on Monday evening however shards of metal, plastic and glass remain after the vehicle was moved. This should be cleared asap as there is potential for tyre damage on passing or parking vehicles.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Valley Road, Shortlands, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping, 15th July
item.description:
There is a pile of what appears to be garden/building waste that has been tipped outside the rear gate to Anerley Methodist Church next to the Sivyer haulage yard on Minden Road.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Minden Road, Anerley, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Bin not emptied, 15th July
item.description:
Bin not emptied or monitored at bus stop 18 hook lane . Will now have people trying to put more rubbish in and leaving it in area . Foxes will also pull out tonight and leave scattered in road and pavement

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Hook Lane, Welling, London

item.title: 5 Paving stones cracked, 15th July
item.description:
Returning from holiday to find 5 paving stones badly cracked in front of my house. Am told a contractor was seen unloading sacks of sand etc, into our alleyway. I do not know the neighbor involved.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Broomfield Road, Elmers End, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Overflowing sewage manhole, 15th July
item.description:
Access road to ASDA lower car park. Problem has been here for approximately one week now. Sewage is leaking from the manhole cover and flowing down onto the public road. The smell is awful.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Two potholes, 15th July
item.description:
Two potholes in centre of road by numbers 248 and 256 old farm avenue been there ages dangerous for bikes and people crossing in the dark. Please fix
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 257, Old Farm Avenue, Longlands, Sidcup, London
